commands.name: help
commands.description: Get a description for all of the the bot's commands.

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Ping the bot to check if it is still alive.

commands.name: connect-page
commands.description: Start the page connection process so you can edit your website. Use the format "Firstname Lastname" when writing your name.

commands.name: change-page layout
commands.description: Let a website team person know that you want to change your page's layout.

commands.name: change-page title
commands.description: Change the title of your page. The link will stay the same.

commands.name: change-page content
commands.description: Fill out a form to change the content of your page. It should quickly update within the minute, but may take a few minutes.

commands.name: request-help
commands.description: Request help from one of the departments, sent in #request-help
